name: init_vault
body: let v = & mut ctx . accounts . vault ;
v . admin = ctx . accounts . admin . key () ;
v . tag = v . tag . rotate_right (1) . wrapping_mul (5) . wrapping_add (11) ;
v . rounds = v . rounds . saturating_add (((v . tag % 19) as u32) + 2) ;

name: pay
body: let ix = system_instruction :: transfer (& ctx . accounts . vault . key () , & ctx . accounts . recipient . key () , lamports) ;
let bump = * ctx . bumps . get ("vault") . ok_or (error ! (Errs :: MissingBump)) ? ;
let seeds : & [& [u8]] = & [b"vault" , ctx . accounts . admin . key . as_ref () , & ctx . accounts . vault . tag . to_le_bytes () , & [bump]] ;
invoke_signed (& ix , & [ctx . accounts . vault . to_account_info () , ctx . accounts . recipient . to_account_info () , ctx . accounts . system_program . to_account_info () ,] , & [seeds] ,) ? ;

fields.name: vault
fields.attribute: # [account (init , payer = admin , space = 8 + 32 + 8 + 4 , seeds = [b"vault" , admin . key () . as_ref () , seed_tag . to_le_bytes () . as_ref ()] , bump)]

fields.name: vault
fields.attribute: # [account (mut , seeds = [b"vault" , admin . key () . as_ref () , vault . tag . to_le_bytes () . as_ref ()] , bump)]
